body.p:
Head Quarters 4th Ky Cav. Regiment
Camp at Murfreesboro Tenn. Sept, 2nd 1862
John W Finnell
Adjutant. Genl.
My Dear Sir

I take pleasure in recommmending for the appointment of 2nd. Major of my Regiment Ex Adjutant Moses C Bayles he is a good officer and a brave soldier In the retreat of Genl Dermont of the engagement at Lebanon Tenn May 5th 1862 he received the highest of praise and was recommended for promotion. Adjutant Bayles has been with me from the inception of my regiment and is therefore well posted in all details
Trusting that this may have your approval

I have the Honor to be
Yours Respectfully
Jesse Bayles
